hazard: Driving a vehicle on a highway
hazard_description: Operating a vehicle at highway speeds introduces significant dynamic risk due to speed, traffic density, and environmental factors.
top_event: Loss of control over the vehicle
top_event_description: The driver is no longer able to keep the vehicle in a safe state, resulting in a hazardous situation.

threats.name: Intoxicated driving
threats.description: Operator impairment due to alcohol or drugs can lead to delayed reactions and poor decision-making.

threats.name: Speeding
threats.description: Operating the vehicle above safe speeds reduces reaction time and increases stopping distance.

threats.name: Distracted driving
threats.description: Mobile device use, eating, or other distractions reduce awareness of roadway conditions.

prevention_barriers.name: Designated driver
prevention_barriers.description: Assign a sober driver to eliminate impairment risk before departure.

prevention_barriers.name: Lane departure warning
prevention_barriers.description: Assistive technology alerts the driver when the vehicle begins to leave its lane.

prevention_barriers.name: Speed governance
prevention_barriers.description: Limit vehicle top speed via hardware or telematics policies to reduce speeding risk.

mitigation_barriers.name: Seatbelt use
mitigation_barriers.description: Occupants wearing seatbelts reduce the severity of injuries during a collision.

mitigation_barriers.name: Defensive driving training
mitigation_barriers.description: Training equips drivers to respond safely to loss-of-control scenarios.

mitigation_barriers.name: Automatic emergency braking
mitigation_barriers.description: Sensors detect imminent collisions and apply the brakes to stay below injury thresholds.

consequences.name: Injury or death
consequences.description: Occupants and other road users may suffer serious harm.

consequences.name: Vehicle damage
consequences.description: Loss of control can result in significant damage to the vehicle and property.

consequences.name: Traffic disruption
consequences.description: Incidents can close lanes and create congestion for other motorists.
